definition: again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)

sentences.english: The state might not mind trying this again and asking for the death penalty, the judge said.
sentences.chinese: 國家可能不介意再審他一次，判他死刑，法官說。

sentences.english: Especially its conflict with the re-trial system becomes more obvious.
sentences.chinese: 其中我國的再審制度與之衝突更爲明顯。

sentences.english: The people's court shall form a new collegial panel for the purpose of the retrial.
sentences.chinese: 人民法院審理再審案件，應當另行組成合議庭。

sentences.english: The people's court shall conduct a trial denovo of a case protested by the people's procuratorate.
sentences.chinese: 人民檢察院提出抗訴的案件，人民法院應當再審。

sentences.english: To reinstitute the death penalty review (to the high court) does not mean we will abolish capital punishment.
sentences.chinese: 重新設立死刑再審並不意味着我們將廢除死罪的處罰。

sentences.english: The third part is to review the foreign criminal rehear process comparatively.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分爲刑事再審程序提起的比較法考察。

sentences.english: Chapter Two---The Comparative Study (Comparative Law) of the the Third Party's Applying for Retrial.
sentences.chinese: 第二章案外人申請再審之比較法研究。

sentences.english: After a three-hour hearing, the trial was adjourned to Oct 1.
sentences.chinese: 庭審持續三小時，並延期至10月1日再審。

sentences.english: The people's court shall, upon examination and verification, re-adjudicate the case.
sentences.chinese: 經人民法院審查屬實的，應當再審。

sentences.english: This article plans to unify the re-trying practice, the following question makes the rational ponder.
sentences.chinese: 本文擬結合再審實踐，就如下問題作些理性思考。

sentences.english: Among them, the one that is worth reviewing and making criticism is the review system of our country.
sentences.chinese: 其中，最值得反思與檢討的是我國的再審制度。

sentences.english: The rehearing system causes judge to be undecidedly and descends the judicial authority.
sentences.chinese: 再審制度導致裁判的不確定和司法權威的下降。

sentences.english: Qiju is a kind of re-appeal procedural system in Qin and Han Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 乞鞫是秦漢時期的一種再審訴訟制度。

definition: common plea/civil appeal (as opposed to criminal case)
preliminary hearing/interrogation (of a suspect)/preliminary examination (of a project etc)
to relieve sb of his post/to sack/to demote/dismissal/sacking
to sue/to bring a lawsuit against/to prosecute
to decide (in a meeting)/to resolve (i.e. pass a resolution)
to conclude a case/to wind up
